title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/28/22
itunes:title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/28/22
description:
George Noory and activist Glenn Rhoades discuss his efforts to persuade government officials to strengthen the country's power grid against solar flares or attacks by hostile countries, which could cause catastrophic damage to society if it fails.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
